item.content:encoded:
A classic transportation toy, the go-kart is a fast, high-powered open air seated car that has been thrilling and engaging hobbyists for countless years.  Some sources, in fact, trace the origins of this versatile vehicle back to the 1950s; and since that time, owners have both cruised around happily in their own neighborhoods at the helm of their beloved go-karts, and raced them competitively in both professional and amateur events.

A slicker and more compact version of a racecar, the go-kart stands as without a doubt a popular and high impact transportation toy.  Now just imagine combining the magic of the go-kart with the cutting edge technology of the GOTRAX hoverboard.

Well, imagine no more.  The HoverKart has arrived; an interstellar vehicle that blends and combines the classic sportiness of the go-kart with the futuristic power and velocity of the GOTRAX Hoverfly hoverboard.

The Hoverfly Eco Hoverboard

The HoverKart, or GOTRAX Hoverfly Kart, is basically a GOTRAX Hoverfly graced with a Hoverboard Seat; harnessing the space age awesomeness of the Hoverfly within the sophisticated structure of a traditional go-kart.

As you may know, the Hoverfly Eco just may be the ultimate and original space age recreational vehicle. Boasting both top notch torque and top speeds, the Hoverfly is a smooth, self-balancing hoverboard scooter boasting dual 250W motors and gliding along up to 7.4 mph.  You can travel up to 12 miles on a single charge, and enjoy lots of fun extras that include lunar bright LED lights and a 0-degree turning radius.

So how could you make this ultra cool hoverboard even more—um—ultra cooler? Just add a comfortable and flexible hoverboard seat to conjure a Hoverboard go-kart.

The Hoverfly Hoverboard Kart

The Hoverfly Kart is an amazing galactic go-kart that comes complete with a fully adjustable frame and a spacious and most comfortable seat. Its easily accessible universal frame fits most hoverboards bearing 6”-10” inch tires, strapping on easily for the ultimate ride.

This revolutionary hoverboard kart boasts a handy and practical handlebar steering system and is thoroughly and fully adjustable; featuring a telescoping frame that permits you to adjust the frame to your particular height, and flexible hand controls that ensure the most effortless and enjoyable cruise.

The HoverKart is quick and easy to assemble; believe it or not, this advanced transportation toy can be put together and prepared to launch in about 10 minutes.  Soon you will find yourself cruising along at a smooth but exhilarating pace; launching yourself full and free into what is sure to be the ride of a lifetime.

Life on a Hoverboard Seat

The cosmic ride of a lifetime is also sure to be one of the safest and most comfortable rides you’ll ever enjoy.  You are sure to have no trouble navigating the simple handlebar steering as you recline easily astride the low center of gravity seat.  Grip with ease the space-foam handlebar grips, feeling the slick turbo power of the hoverboard beneath you as you partake in the first of what is sure to be many ultra thrilling celestial journeys.

Feel free to glide along on your Hoverfly Kart across the safe expanse of a closed course or down your own driveway.  Race with your friends or enjoy a slower, more rhythmic ride alone, on your own accord.

If you yearn to venture farther, riding your HoverKart to skate parks or perhaps even to work, first be sure to contact your local Department of Motor Vehicles to ask about local laws and regulations regarding the use of transportation toys on public streets.

If you have any questions regarding the use and maintenance of your GOTRAX Hoverfly Kart, feel free to consult the GOTRAX commander’s manual that corresponds to this product. Released individually to accompany each GOTRAX product, the commander’s manual offers detailed, step by step procedures for riding, operating and caring for your GOTRAX rides.  

And if you are in need of additional help in operating the GOTRAX Hoverfly Kart, be sure to access any of the convenient help features available at GOTRAX.Com. GOTRAX is a customer friendly company that provides a multitude of service options for those experiencing any degree of difficulty with their vehicles and accessories.
